name: Name
welcome_message: Track your health metrics and improve your wellbeing
about_description: BioTrack is an advanced health monitoring system that measures vital signs such as body composition, heart rate, blood glucose, and temperature, focusing on lower limb health. It provides accurate insights through a user-friendly mobile application.
user_not_found: No user found for that email
invalid_email: Please provide a valid email address
too_many_requests: Too many login attempts. Try again later
general_error: An error occurred. Please try again later
password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
agree_terms: You must agree to the terms and privacy policy
agree_terms_privacy: I agree to the Terms & Privacy
complete_profile_now: Would you like to complete your profile now?
preparation_description: Make sure the device is on a flat, stable surface and is properly calibrated.
body_preparation_description: Remove shoes and heavy clothing. Wear light clothing for accurate measurements.
foot_placement_description: Stand with your bare feet centered on the marked areas of the device.
hand_placement_description: Hold the handles firmly but not too tight, with palms making good contact.
during_measurement_description: Stay still and relaxed. Breathe normally and avoid talking during the reading.
after_measurement_description: Wait for all readings to complete before stepping off the device.
biotrack_description: BioTrack is an integrated vital signs monitoring system that measures body composition, heart rate, blood glucose, body temperature, and plantar pressure.
who_can_use_answer: Anyone interested in tracking their health metrics, including fitness enthusiasts, medical patients, and general users.
what_vital_signs: What vital signs does BioTrack monitor?
vital_signs_answer: BioTrack monitors body composition (InBody metrics), heart rate, blood glucose, body temperature, and plantar pressure.
how_measure_glucose: How does BioTrack measure blood glucose?
glucose_measurement_answer: BioTrack uses the MAX30102 sensor to estimate blood glucose levels through non-invasive techniques.
how_setup: How do I set up BioTrack?
setup_answer: Simply connect BioTrack to the mobile app, follow the on-screen instructions, and place your hands and feet on the device to start measuring.
use_without_smartphone: Can I use BioTrack without a smartphone?
without_smartphone_answer: BioTrack is designed to work best with the mobile app, but some basic readings may be available on the device's screen.
inaccurate_answer: Ensure proper contact with sensors, clean the device, and avoid movement during measurement.
not_connecting: What should I do if BioTrack is not connecting to the app?
not_connecting_answer: Check Bluetooth settings, restart the device, and ensure the app is updated to the latest version.
